DOC.brief_summary: An individual randomise control trial ( RCT ) evaluate effectiveness voice-based mobile phone health ( mHealth ) intervention support post-abortion family planning ( PAFP ) four Marie Stopes International clinic Cambodia . The study seek address research question : PAFP mHealth intervention increase use contraception Cambodia ?
DOC.criteria: Client attend abortion Client want child current time Client age 18 Client own mobile phone Client willing receive simple voice message relate contraception Marie Stopes Khmer language Not meet inclusion criterion Declined participate
